backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko canister implementing a DEX monitoring and arbitrage analysis engine, defining core domain types (DEX configs, price snapshots, signals, shadow trades) and utilities like ring buffers, timers, and metrics collection. It orchestrates price polling, signal detection, shadow execution tracking, and performance logging.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal canister migration module that preserves the existing actor state by returning the old actor unchanged during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report documenting implemented backend and frontend features, including system readiness state, timer failure handling, and tick synchronization, with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten JSON-style summaries describing the purpose of major frontend source files, components, hooks, pages, styles, and configuration used across the React application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base defining design tokens, OKLCH color variables, dark/light themes, chart colors, and shared layout styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that defines the root DOM container and loads the React application via the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React application component configuring TanStack Router routes, page navigation, theme handling, and global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout component providing the persistent UI shell with sidebar navigation, header branding, notification center, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AutoRefreshContr: Reusable toggle component that manages an interval-based auto-refresh mechanism, invoking a callback on a configurable cadence with proper lifecycle cleanup.
frontend/src/components/BacktestPanel.ts: Dashboard panel displaying real-time shadow execution backtesting metrics and a detailed trade log, using backend queries and status badges for performance insight.
frontend/src/components/CkBtcIcpRatioSpa: Renders a small SVG sparkline of ckBTC/ICP ratio samples over time, computing min/max and scaling points with useMemo. Shows a placeholder message when insufficient samples are available.
frontend/src/components/CkBtcIcpRatioWid: Main dashboard widget that fetches live ckBTC/ICP ratio data, collects recent samples based on backend ticks, and displays current stats, viability indicators, and a sparkline. Handles loading, error, and live status states using ICPSwap data.
frontend/src/components/DecisionHistoryT: Displays a filterable table of decision events with timestamps, steps, and results, including a dialog to inspect detailed decision data. Supports loading and empty states and step-based filtering.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionBlocked: Static informational panel indicating that trade execution is not implemented, outlining required DEX integration details for ICPSwap and KongSwap. Uses alerts and cards to list missing technical requirements.
frontend/src/components/LatencySignalsPa: Shows recent latency metrics with derived signals such as rolling average and spike detection, plus a table of recent operations. Formats nanosecond timings and highlights abnormal latency behavior.
frontend/src/components/LiveDataSourceCo: Provides controls to enable or disable a live ICPSwap data polling loop, displaying backend status, timer state, and environment warnings. Integrates toggle actions with backend mutations and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/LiveDetectionsPa: Displays the latest signal detection events in a card with loading, empty, and error states, formatting timestamps, currency, and percentages. Renders a table of up to 20 events with price fluctuation, safe order size, and risk indicators.
frontend/src/components/MarketSnapshotGr: Shows a grid of price snapshots for a trading pair across Binance, ICPSwap, and KongSwap. Each snapshot card displays price, reserves, recency, and opens a details dialog when available.
frontend/src/components/NotificationCent: Renders a dismissible list of system warning notifications using a shared notification hook. Supports clearing individual warnings or all warnings at once and hides itself when empty.
frontend/src/components/OptimizerPanel.t: Presents the status and metadata of an on-chain optimizer and its safe training dataset. Includes dataset stats, exclusion rules, and a disabled placeholder button for running future optimization passes.
frontend/src/components/PipelineStatusPa: Visualizes the current status of the HCQ decision pipeline steps with timestamps and running state. Optionally displays a summary of recent latency metrics with average duration.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexPan: Simulates polling prices from ICPSwap and KongSwap, computes spread, volatility, and arbitrage viability, and stores price points via backend hooks. Displays live monitoring metrics while the agent is running.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Implements the applicationâ€™s left-side navigation with route-aware active styling. Defines links to major sections like Market Watch, Agent, Execution, and Configuration.
frontend/src/components/SnapshotDetailsD: Dialog component that displays detailed information for a price snapshot, including source, pair, price, timestamp, reserves, and raw backend response with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/StrategyParamete: UI panel showing mock strategy parameter versions with status, actions, and explanatory notes, intended as a placeholder until backend versioning APIs are implemented.
frontend/src/components/SystemReadyIndic: Status badge component that queries system readiness and shows whether required conditions are met, with tooltips explaining readiness or missing conditions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent React Query caches when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationCenter: Hook that exposes warnings from a global notification center, providing subscription-based updates and helper methods to add, remove, or clear warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for DEX configuration, system status, decision history, and agent control, with cache invalidation and local interim types.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme design tokens, base styles, and shared UI variables for the application.
frontend/src/lib/analysis.ts: Utility module that analyzes price spreads using fees, slippage, and profit thresholds to produce a trading signal with explanatory reasoning.
frontend/src/lib/notificationCenter.ts: Implements a simple global notification center for warning messages with add/remove/clear functionality and listener subscriptions. Exports predefined warning IDs for common error cases.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Defines a utility function to merge conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides validation helpers for canister IDs and DEX trading pair configurations, returning structured validity and error messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AgentPage.tsx: UI for starting and stopping the autonomous agent, displaying pipeline status, latency metrics, sensory cortex data, and decision history.
frontend/src/pages/ConfigurationPage.tsx: Configuration interface for managing DEXes, canister IDs, and trading pairs with validation, persistence via backend hooks, and user feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ExecutionPage.tsx: Execution control page that gates real trade execution behind a mandatory risk acknowledgement and displays a blocked execution panel.
frontend/src/pages/MarketWatchPage.tsx: Market monitoring page that fetches and records price snapshots from Binance and configured DEXes, supports auto-refresh, and displays system readiness.
frontend/src/pages/SelfImprovementPage.t: Evolutionary lab page aggregating backtesting, optimization, live detections, and strategy parameter tuning panels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color system based on CSS variables, fonts, animations, plugins, and layout defaults.
project_state.json: Project metadata/state file describing the icp_quant_agent prototype, including overall architecture summary and a catalog of existing backend/frontend features with IDs, descriptions, versions, and requirement links.
